name: @atmtfy/elite
description: Elite Shopify 2.0 Theme. Based on Shopify's "Dawn", but with preprocessing, etc
author: Automatify

scripts.start: pnpm  build && cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && cd ../ && run-p watch serve
scripts.dev:new: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && cd ../ && run-p watch serve
scripts.deploy: pnpm webpack -env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push -n
scripts.pull: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme pull
scripts.pull:dev: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme pull -d
scripts.pull:config: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.pull:templates: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -o 'templates/*.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.pull:live: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -l && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.pull:live:config: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -l -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.pull:live:templates: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -l -o 'templates/*.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.pull:dev:templates: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -d -o 'templates/*.json' -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.pull:dev:config: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme pull -d -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.push: pnpm webpack --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push -n --unpublished
scripts.push:dry: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme push -n --unpublished
scripts.push:templates: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme push -n -o 'templates/*.json' -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.push:config: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme push -n  -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.push:live:templates: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme push -n -l -o 'templates/*.json' -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.push:live:config: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme push -n -l -o 'templates/*.json' -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.push:dev:templates: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme push -n -d -o 'templates/*.json' -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.push:dev:config: cd dist && rm -f ./.shopifyignore  && shopify theme push -n -d -o 'config/settings_data.json' && cp ../.shopifyignore ./
scripts.update: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push -n
scripts.update:dev: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push -n -d
scripts.update:live: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push -n -l
scripts.update:dry:templates: cd dist && rm .shopifyignore && touch .shopifyignore && shopify theme push -n
scripts.publish: pnpm  webpack -- --env=production && cd dist && shopify theme push -n --publish
scripts.serve:debug: cd dist && SHOPIFY_CLI_STACKTRACE=1 shopify theme serve
scripts.sync: pnpm pull:live:templates && pnpm pull:live:config && pnpm push:dev:templates && pnpm push:dev:config
scripts.merge: pnpm merge:pre && pnpm run build && pnpm merge:post
scripts.merge:pre: mkdir tmp && cd dist && cp -r templates ../tmp/templates && cp config/settings_data.json ../tmp
scripts.merge:post: cd dist && rm -rf templates && rm -rf config/settings_data.json && mv  ../tmp/templates ./ && mv ../tmp/settings_data.json ./config && rm -rf ../tmp
